reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits beautifully and flatters curvy shapes, with one noting its deep v-neck is incredibly flattering. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality, comfort, and material, being made of thick fabric with enough stretch to keep it comfy. However, opinions about the length are mixed, with some finding it nice while others say it's too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress That Was Perfect for Formal Night
items.body: I bought this dress specifically for a cruise formal night, and it ended up being absolutely perfect. The material is thick, super soft, and incredibly stretchy, so it hugs your curves in all the right ways without feeling tight or restrictive. It really does fit like a glove, but in a comfortable, flattering way. The V-neck and ruched detailing give it a beautiful shape, and the high waist adds a slimming effect that looks great in photosâ€”especially cruise formal photos! I felt sexy, confident, and completely comfortable the entire night. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Stemple

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size Iâ€™m wearing a medium
items.body: I purchased for a holiday party Iâ€™m 153 pounds and Iâ€™m 5â€™3â€ I purchased a size medium. It fits perfect it goes right above my knee. The length is great. The dress is very stretchyIâ€™m wearing it without a bra. You can wear this with the strapless or pasties or a regular bra of course. This dress is gorgeous very comfortable. The material is thin so if youâ€™re like me wearing it in December wear a jacket overall I give this stress five stars. Distress is a must I do recommend.hopefully this helps someone.12/09/2025 Read more
items.author: Bravo ðŸ¤

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable AND flattering
items.body: Really GREAT dress. I love the neck line because the dress is sewn in such a great way you can adjust the dress to not have your breast out or pull it down for more cleavage. The dress feels like it has a double layer of thick material to suck everything in without shape wear, instead a really soft comfortable type of compression. I plan to still wear mine but in the pic I have no shape wear or bra on. It hugs curves in the perfect spot. Would be flattering on anyone. I pair my dress with a gold belt that looks just like a Versace belt for 10 bucks on Amazon and it looks amazing together. Iâ€™m 5â€™5 170lbs and got a large. Just buy the dress! Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars What a great dress! Soft, stretchy, Va Va Voom look!
items.body: Oh, my. What a dress! For so little money I paid, it got the desired effect I was going for. Definitely, a head turner.... I am normally a size M so I ordered the M and it fit Perfectly! Hugged in all the right places and hid some less than flattering areas. The dress was very comfortable with soft, stretchy material but more importantly, my undergarments were unnoticeable. My only concern was the V-neck. It was a bit lower than I had anticipated so the bra I originally had in mind didn't work but, no worries, that is what boob tape is for. Overall, I loved the dress, felt very sexy in it and I have already recommended buying this dress to ladies I know. Read more
items.author: Veronica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering dress
items.body: The dress is very flattering. I usually wear a large and ordered a large and I felt like it fit perfectly. The dress is true to size. The only complaint I have is that because of the material, if you are walking around a lot, the dress will start to ride up a little bit. Read more
items.author: Melanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress!
items.body: This dress is amazing for the price. The material is thick, stretchy, soft, and buttery, almost like an athletic dress but it looks elegant at the same time. Iâ€™m 5â€™5â€ and a more muscular/curvy 180 pounds and the dress fits perfectly, complimenting curves instead of accentuating a slight muffin topðŸ˜‚ Itâ€™s not too short either, it hits around mid-thigh and can be pulled up or down and still looks normal. THE ONLY THING is that the neckline really is THAT low in the pictures, so keep that in mind. It can be worn with a cami or higher cut bra to solve that and still look good. WORTH IT! Read more
items.author: Jackie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wash it before you wear it ðŸ˜­
items.body: Donâ€™t get me wrong, itâ€™s sexy as heck for one night. But the darn thing turned me blue for a few hours. Wash it before you wear it! Read more
items.author: Emilie Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress!
items.body: So comfortable, nice material and quality fits well. Great price Read more
items.author: Shelby shirer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Long Sleeve Ruched Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Long Sleeve Ruched Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Grey, Rose, Black, Orange, Light Olive, Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Fluo Pink, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
